hero.title: Building Interfaces That Understand Emotions
hero.description: HUA Labs researches and develops next-generation interfaces that understand and respond to user emotions.

features.title: The Value We Create
features.subtitle: Pursuing the balance between technology and emotion

emotion.title: Emotion Understanding
emotion.description: We create interfaces that understand and empathize with users through AI-based emotion analysis.

sumDiary.name: Sum Diary
sumDiary.description: A smart diary service where AI analyzes and understands your emotions. Record your daily feelings and discover patterns.

huaUx.name: HUA UX Framework
huaUx.description: A React framework with pre-connected UI + Motion + i18n. Build beautiful UX quickly.

cta.title: Let's Build Together
